title: Harvesting Sweet Potatoes at Don's Produce

tasks.task: Planting sweet potatoes and preparing them for irrigation.
subtasks: Determine when to plant sweet potatoes.
Prepare the soil for planting sweet potatoes.
Plant sweet potatoes and ensure proper moisture.
Monitor the impact of rain on sweet potato establishment.

tasks.task: Cultivating sweet potatoes to manage weeds and runners.
subtasks: Explain the purpose of cultivating sweet potatoes.
Remove weeds from the sweet potato plants.
Regulate sweet potato runners to maintain size.

tasks.task: Using a potato harvester for cultivating sweet potatoes.
subtasks: Operate the potato harvester.
Set the depth for the potato harvester when digging.
Demonstrate how the potato harvester works.
Manually wash sweet potatoes.
Transport washed sweet potatoes to the storing trailer.
Store sweet potatoes in a curing process for winter.

tasks.task: Planting sweet potatoes and preparing them for irrigation.
subtasks: Determine when to plant sweet potatoes (a week ago, then yesterday).
Prepare the soil for planting.
Plant sweet potatoes and ensure proper moisture (with the need for rain).

tasks.task: Cultivating sweet potatoes to manage weeds and runners.
subtasks: Explain the purpose of cultivating (weed removal, runner management).
Manage sweet potato runners.
Benefit of pulling runners back.

tasks.task: Using a potato harvester for cultivation.
subtasks: Operate the hydraulic potato harvester.
Set depth for the harvester when used on sweet potatoes.
Manually wash sweet potatoes.
Transfer washed potatoes to a storing trailer.
Store potatoes for winter curing.
